tabsContent.htmlContent:
Background

Understanding the context and requirements of your project is fundamental to our approach. We have conducted thorough research and analysis to ensure our proposal addresses your specific needs.

Project Context

Your organization is seeking a partner who can deliver comprehensive professional services while maintaining the highest standards of quality and efficiency.

Scope of Work

Our proposed scope encompasses all aspects necessary to successfully deliver your project requirements.

Included Services

  • Initial consultation and requirements analysis
  • Detailed planning and design
  • Implementation and execution
  • Quality assurance and testing
  • Documentation and knowledge transfer
  • Ongoing support and maintenance

Our Approach

We follow a structured, proven methodology that ensures successful project delivery while maintaining flexibility to adapt to changing requirements.

Methodology

  1. Discovery Phase: Understand requirements and constraints

  2. Planning Phase: Develop detailed project plan

    and timeline

  3. Execution Phase: Implement solutions with regular checkpoints

  4. Review Phase: Quality assurance and stakeholder feedback

  5. Delivery Phase: Final handover and documentation

Project Schedule

We propose the following timeline for project delivery:

Phase Duration Key Deliverables
Discovery 2 weeks Requirements document, Project plan
Design 3 weeks Design specifications, Prototypes
Implementation 8 weeks Working solution, Progress reports
Testing & QA 2 weeks Test reports, Bug fixes
Deployment 1 week Live system, Documentation

Project Deliverables

We commit to delivering the following outputs:

Documentation

  • Requirements specification document
  • Technical design documentation
  • User guides and training materials
  • System administration manuals

Technical Deliverables

  • Fully functional system/solution
  • Source code and configuration files
  • Test results and quality reports
  • Deployment scripts and procedures

<##>Requirements

To ensure successful project delivery, we require the following from your organization:

Client Responsibilities

  • Timely access to key stakeholders for requirements gathering
  • Provision of necessary system access and credentials
  • Timely feedback on deliverables and milestones
  • Designated project liaison for communication

Technical Requirements

  • Access to development/staging environments
  • Relevant documentation and existing system information
  • Approval processes and sign-off procedures

Our Team

Meet the experienced professionals who will be working on your project. Our team brings together diverse expertise and a proven track record of successful project delivery.

IPP Consultants provides a highly experienced, cost-competitive service across our core competences in **Estimating**, **Planning & Scheduling**, **Project Controls, Commercial Management, Risk Management, Senior Advisory and specific managed services.**  We deliver superior results to our clients by combining our **trusted senior technical experience** with the power of **state-of the-art digital tools** supporting both our work and client processes. 

- Over 17 combined years’ experience
- 60+ experienced professionals
- 40+ countries working experience
- Registered offices in South Africa, Australia and, more recently, in Chile
- Extensive network able to operate / mobilize globally, wherever our clients need us
- Deep hands-on expertise with best industry practices in study gates, estimating, planning, commercial and contractual matters working with large corporations.

We can join owners teams, partner with reputed contractors or provide ad-hoc specialized services, local site-based or offshore, adjusting to your specific logistics, commercial models and scaling requirements.    

---

Our core service offer consiste of

- **Estimating:** Detailed cost estimating and budget development, adhering to best industry standards and using verified benchmarks and historical data.
    - **CAPEX Estimating and Estimate review**: Development or review of 3rd party-produced estimates, working in coordination with study teams (or execution team in case of Definitive Estimates and EACs) to properly capture study maturity and adhere to corporate requirements.
    - **Mine Closure Estimating:**  Our approach delivers reliable forecasts of decommissioning, rehabilitation and post-closure obligations, enabling clients to meet technical, financial, environmental, and regulatory compliance requirements, to ensure responsible and cost-effective closure planning.
    - **OPEX Financial Modeling:** Advanced operational expenditure (OPEX) financial modelling to support informed decision-making and long-term sustainability of projects. Our models integrate technical, commercial and risk data to deliver a clear picture of ongoing costs, enabling clients to optimize operations and achieve financial resilience
- **Planning & Scheduling**: Integrated project resource-loaded scheduling, with thorough check on critical path analysis, in adherfence with best industry practices (such as as 14-points DCMA) and corporate standards and guidelines.
- **Project Controls**:  We establish clear controls, monitor performances, develop focused deviation analysis, provide timely warnings and forecasts; and deliver robust & flexible routine reporting.
    - **Progress & Schedule Control**
    - **Budget Management**
    - **Cost Engineering / Quantity Surveying**: Lifecycle cost control, value engineering, contract valuation
    - **Cost Administration**: Payment certification, variation tracking, and financial reporting for transparent cost governance
- **Commercial Management (Contracts & Procurement)**
    - **Procurement management:** Deliver structured procurement management services that ensure the timely, cost-effective, and compliant acquisition of goods, services and works required for project success. Our approach integrates technical, commercial, and contractual expertise with digital tools to provide agility, transparency and accountability across the supply chain.
    - **Contract administration / management:** End-to-end contract management services that ensure clarity, compliance and control throughout the project lifecycle. Our approach integrates legal precision with operational practicality, enabling clients to manage obligations, mitigate risks, and resolve disputes efficiently
    - **Dispute Resolution:** Structured dispute resolution services that safeguard project outcomes and maintain strong stakeholder relationships. Our approach combines legal precision with practical engineering and project management expertise, ensuring disputes are resolved efficiently, fairly, and in alignment with contractual frameworks.
- **Risk Management**: Identification, quantification, and mitigation of technical, financial, and contractual risks
- **Advisory and Assurance Services:** independent advisory and assurance services that strengthen decision-making, enhance governance, and build stakeholder confidence. Our approach combines technical expertise, financial insight, and regulatory compliance to deliver transparent, reliable, and actionable outcomes across the project lifecycle
- **Managed Services:**
    - **Document Control**: Structured document workflows, version control, and compliance archiving to support audit readiness
    - **Project Management**: End-to-end coordination of multidisciplinary teams, scope, time, and quality control
    - **Governance & Procedures:** Drafting, assessment and auditing compliance
    - **Study Management:** From chapter drafting to gate report and presentation dry-runs, Concept to Feasibility phases
    - **Project Capitalization**: Convert the actual total capital expenditure in the company operating assets in adherence to applicable accounting requirements.

---

In addition, our partnerships with leading RSA-based organizations allow us to extend our service to teh following specialties :

- **Environmental & Sustainability**
    - Environmental Impact Assessment
    - Environmental licensing
    - Environmental compliance
    - Environmental monitoring programs
    - ESG strategy and performance support
    - Financial provisioning
    - Closure planning
    - Tailings rehabilitation strategies
    - R&D support
    - HSE management system auditing and implementation
- **Specialty Engineering**
    - Multi-disciplinary engineering (civils, structural, mechanical, electrical, process, infrastructure interfaces)
    - Project governance support (design and delivery phases)
    - BIM and GIS delivery
    - Common Data Environments (CDE) and data-driven collaboration
    - Drones, reality capture, and digital twins
- **BIM modeling & Integration**
    - 3D engineering design services
    - Coordinated design packages
    - Intelligent P&IDs and tagged documentation
    - Laser scanning and point cloud integration (brownfield accuracy)
    - Engineering data management
    - Handover packages
    - Model coordination and clash detection

Commercial Terms

Investment

Our proposed fee structure is designed to provide excellent value while ensuring the highest quality of service delivery.

Item Cost
Professional Services $XXX,XXX
Project Management $XX,XXX
Quality Assurance $XX,XXX
Total Investment $XXX,XXX

Payment Terms

  • 30% upon contract signing
  • 40% upon completion of design phase
  • 30% upon final delivery and acceptance

Our Experience

Explore our portfolio of successful projects across various industries and sectors. Use the filters to view projects by entity or service type.
tabsContent.introText: Explore our global portfolio of successful projects across diverse industries and regions. Use the filters to discover projects by client, country, or service type.

tabsContent.htmlContent:
Who We Are

We are a leading professional services firm with decades of experience delivering exceptional results across multiple industries. Our team combines technical expertise with innovative thinking to solve complex challenges.

Our core values include integrity, excellence, and collaboration. We work closely with our clients to understand their unique needs and deliver tailored solutions that exceed expectations.

Executive Summary

This proposal outlines our comprehensive approach to delivering high-quality professional services for your organization. We bring together industry-leading expertise, proven methodologies, and a commitment to excellence.

Key Highlights

  • Experienced team with proven track record
  • Innovative solutions tailored to your needs
  • Competitive pricing and flexible engagement models
  • Commitment to quality and timely delivery

Background

Understanding the context and requirements of your project is fundamental to our approach. We have conducted thorough research and analysis to ensure our proposal addresses your specific needs.

Project Context

Your organization is seeking a partner who can deliver comprehensive professional services while maintaining the highest standards of quality and efficiency.

Scope of Work

Our proposed scope encompasses all aspects necessary to successfully deliver your project requirements.

Included Services

  • Initial consultation and requirements analysis
  • Detailed planning and design
  • Implementation and execution
  • Quality assurance and testing
  • Documentation and knowledge transfer
  • Ongoing support and maintenance

Our Approach

We follow a structured, proven methodology that ensures successful project delivery while maintaining flexibility to adapt to changing requirements.

Methodology

  1. Discovery Phase: Understand requirements and constraints
  2. Planning Phase: Develop detailed project plan and timeline
  3. Execution Phase: Implement solutions with regular checkpoints
  4. Review Phase: Quality assurance and stakeholder feedback
  5. Delivery Phase: Final handover and documentation

Project Schedule

We propose the following timeline for project delivery:

Phase Duration Key Deliverables
Discovery 2 weeks Requirements document, Project plan
Design 3 weeks Design specifications, Prototypes
Implementation 8 weeks Working solution, Progress reports
Testing & QA 2 weeks Test reports, Bug fixes
Deployment 1 week Live system, Documentation

Project Deliverables

We commit to delivering the following outputs:

Documentation

  • Requirements specification document
  • Technical design documentation
  • User guides and training materials
  • System administration manuals

Technical Deliverables

  • Fully functional system/solution
  • Source code and configuration files
  • Test results and quality reports
  • Deployment scripts and procedures

Requirements

To ensure successful project delivery, we require the following from your organization:

Client Responsibilities

  • Timely access to key stakeholders for requirements gathering
  • Provision of necessary system access and credentials
  • Timely feedback on deliverables and milestones
  • Designated project liaison for communication

Technical Requirements

  • Access to development/staging environments
  • Relevant documentation and existing system information
  • Approval processes and sign-off procedures

Our Team

Meet the experienced professionals who will be working on your project. Our team brings together diverse expertise and a proven track record of successful project delivery.

Project Assumptions

This proposal is based on the following assumptions:

  • Project scope as defined in this document remains stable
  • Client will provide timely feedback and approvals
  • Necessary resources and access will be available as required
  • No major changes to regulatory or compliance requirements during project
  • Standard business hours apply unless otherwise agreed
  • Payment terms will be honored according to agreed schedule

Change Management

Any changes to scope, timeline, or deliverables will be managed through a formal change request process with appropriate impact assessment and approval.

Commercial Terms

Investment

Our proposed fee structure is designed to provide excellent value while ensuring the highest quality of service delivery.

Item Cost
Professional Services $XXX,XXX
Project Management $XX,XXX
Quality Assurance $XX,XXX
Total Investment $XXX,XXX

Payment Terms

  • 30% upon contract signing
  • 40% upon completion of design phase
  • 30% upon final delivery and acceptance

Our Experience

Explore our portfolio of successful projects across various industries and sectors. Use the filters to view projects by entity or service type.
